func.title: Trans_Rotate

param.name: angle
param.desc: Rotation angle. When looking into the same direction as the rotation axis then positive angles do anti-clockwise rotation and negative angles do clockwise rotation.

param.name: rx
param.desc: X coordinate of the rotation axis.

param.name: ry
param.desc: Y coordinate of the rotation axis.

param.name: rz
param.desc: Z coordinate of the rotation axis.

func.desc: Returns a 3x4 rotation matrix around the axis given by the vector (rx, ry, rz) by angle degrees. It can be used as a transformation for AttachMesh or for the "PictureTransformation" or "MeshTransformation" properties (see Meshes).

example.text: Rotates the picture graphics of the calling object by 20 degrees around the Y axis.
